evolution_stages.conversation_summary: The coach helped Sarah practice speaking in class by preparing comments on math topics like Fourier transforms and eigenvalues. Sarah expressed fears of judgment and freezing, but with support, she delivered her thoughts and received positive feedback, slightly boosting her confidence.
